A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie broke my heart. This clearly showed me that Disney is more concerned with making a few political statements\, and mindlessly empowering women in a franchise that already has strong female leads\, than lovingly crafting a good movie worthy of the title Star Wars. If anyone is reading this\, then save your money. Don't give this garbage the benefit of a viewing. As far as I'm concerned\, the new Disney Canon has no rightful place to exist if this is the way they're going to treat this once great franchise.
